jobs: FixViolationResetPasswordTestSpec: Write complete test entries for ResetPasswordPage in docs/tests.md covering all interactive elements (password input, confirm password input, submit button), form validation (password mismatch), success navigation to /clients, server error handling, network error handling, and loading state

FixViolationResetPasswordCode: Fix ResetPasswordPage component - change request body field from 'password' to 'newPassword' to match backend, remove broken auto-login logic (backend returns message not token), add data-testid to error message element, add JSX comments referencing test entries
FixViolationResetPasswordTests: Write Playwright tests for ResetPasswordPage matching the new test entries in docs/tests.md
RunTestsResetPassword: Verify tests pass after ResetPasswordPage fixes
